title: Professional bi-lingual staff, Professional Bilingual Staff, Disposal
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-New Fully Renovated Interiors!', '-Renovated and Expanded Clubhouse With a Refreshed Fitness Center', '-Large Closets', '-New Designer Interior Paint Colors', '-Individual Climate Control', '-Cable', '-Satellite', '-Patio/Balcony', '-Upgraded Swimming Pool Areas With All New Furniture and Cabanas', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Professional Bilingual Staff', '-High speed internet', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
